properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the ObjectExportOption (a ObjectStyle, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Group or TextFrame).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The source type of alternate text
properties.name: altTextSourceType

properties.description: The source type of actual text
properties.name: actualTextSourceType

properties.description: The custom alternate text entered by the user
properties.name: customAltText

properties.description: The custom actual text entered by the user
properties.name: customActualText

properties.description: The metadata property to use as source of alternate text. Can return: Ordered array containing namespacePrefix:String, propertyPath:String.
properties.name: altMetadataProperty

properties.description: The metadata property to use as source of actual text. Can return: Ordered array containing namespacePrefix:String, propertyPath:String.
properties.name: actualMetadataProperty

properties.description: The tag type of page item
properties.name: applyTagType

properties.description: If true, custom image conversion is enabled for object
properties.name: customImageConversion

properties.description: Allows user to select the image format for conversion
properties.name: imageConversionType

properties.description: Allows user to select the image size option for conversion
properties.name: customImageSizeOption

properties.description: The export resolution
properties.name: imageExportResolution

properties.description: The color palette for GIF conversion. Note: Not valid when image conversion is JPEG.
properties.name: gifOptionsPalette

properties.description: If true, generates interlaced GIFs. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is JPEG.
properties.name: gifOptionsInterlaced

properties.description: The quality of converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid when image conversion is GIF.
properties.name: jpegOptionsQuality

properties.description: The formatting method for converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is GIF.
properties.name: jpegOptionsFormat

properties.description: Alignment applied to images
properties.name: imageAlignment

properties.description: Space Before applied to images
properties.name: imageSpaceBefore

properties.description: Space After applied to images
properties.name: imageSpaceAfter

properties.description: If true, image page break settings will be used in objects
properties.name: useImagePageBreak

properties.description: Image page break settings to be used with objects
properties.name: imagePageBreak

properties.description: If true, custom layout is enabled for object
properties.name: customLayout

properties.description: Custom Layout settings to be used for object
properties.name: customLayoutType

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Provides the alternate text for the object
methods.name: altText

methods.description: Provides the actual text for the object
methods.name: actualText

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ObjectExportOption.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
